context.arch.intelligibility.weka
Class WekaExplainer<C extends weka.classifiers.Classifier>

java.lang.Object
  context.arch.intelligibility.Explainer
      context.arch.intelligibility.weka.WekaExplainer<C>
Type Parameters:
C - class of the Weka Classifier that the Explainer can explain
Direct Known Subclasses:
J48Explainer, NaiveBayesExplainer
public abstract class WekaExplainer<C extends weka.classifiers.Classifier>
extends Explainer

Mainly adapts the explanation methods of Explainer to handle widget states with Instance data.

Gets the appropriate subclass explainer (from the standard set that has been implemented in the toolkit), depending on the classifier model (e.g. NaiveBayes, J48).

getWhatIfExplanation

public Parameter<?> getWhatIfExplanation(Reason altInputs)
Overrides superclass because ClassifierEnactors only have one EnactorReference. Also does processing using the classifierWrapper instead of EnactorReference queries.

Overrides:
getWhatIfExplanation in class Explainer

getCertaintyExplanation

public DNF getCertaintyExplanation()
Overridden to give classifier accuracy as uncertainty.
